browse-shows: SELECT ShowDetail.ID, ShowName, TypeName, Duration FROM ShowDetail JOIN TypeOfShow ON TypeOfShow.ID = ShowDetail.TypeOfShowID
all-performances-for-single-show: SELECT Performance.ID, ShowDateTime, Duration, LanguageID, LiveMusicID, PriceID FROM Performance JOIN ShowDetail ON Performance.ShowDetailID = ShowDetail.ID WHERE ShowDetailID = show-id-from-java
get-performance-by-ID: select * FROM Performance JOIN ShowDetail ON Performance.ShowDetailID = ShowDetail.ID WHERE Performance.ID = show-id-from-java
